entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
